mapper.select: select * from (select a.*, rownum rn from (select a.app_id ,m.mem_id ,m.mem_nm ,m.mem_grade ,a.app_pay ,to_char(app_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')app_time ,a.app_type ,a.app_del ,a.app_obj from approval a, member m order by a.app_time desc) a) where rn >= (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize} + 1 and rn <= #{page}*#{pageSize}
select sum(app_pay) from member, approval where (app_type ='1' or app_type='2') and mem_grade=#{mem_grade}
